thread.title: Jets star Darrelle Revis involved in Pittsburgh street fight | New York Post
thread.title_full: Jets star Darrelle Revis involved in Pittsburgh street fight | New York Post

author: Hannah Withiam
title: Jets star Darrelle Revis involved in Pittsburgh street fight | New York Post
text:
Police are investigating an altercation in Pittsburgh last weekend involving Jets star Darrelle Revis and at least three other people, Pittsburgh’s Action News 4 reported Thursday .
The details of the incident and Revis’ level of involvement are unclear.
The cornerback and seven-time Pro Bowler was reportedly seen speaking with two people on the street around 2:30 a.m. Monday morning. When the police officer returned to the scene, both of them were lying on the ground and Revis had fled, according to News 4.
According to another report, Revis, 31, was injured in the altercation after being attacked by a group of five people. Revis reportedly was in the Pittsburgh area visiting family over the weekend, according to CBS Pittsburgh , and sought medical treatment following the incident.
